column4: can anyone help me figure out why installing sun-java6-jdk does not enable the javac-command ?
you need to set the environment variable
i think you might be getting this...javac can be found in the following packages
I thought that would happen by default; I set the PATH variable to a jvm-directory, but had hoped it wouldn't be necessay; and yes, I did get that "might be found in " message
